column4: hello, i'm trying to get the 3m microtouch touchscreen to work and i hit the bug described here: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-input-mutouch/+bug/533502 . The end states that the bug is fixed in 11.04, does that mean that there is no way to use it in, say, 10.10?
let me take a look and see.

it looks like fixing your problem in 10.10's version of xserver would create another problem. I think they are working on this, but then again perhaps they aren't because it will be available in 11.04. i would think they will get around to, eventually....
